briefTitle: Predicting Response of Metastatic Triple Negative Breast Cancer to Immunotherapy Based on Patients Cytokine Profile
officialTitle: Predicting Response of Metastatic Triple Negative Breast Cancer to Immunotherapy Based on Patients Cytokine Profile
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of metastatic triple negative breast cancer
* 18 years of age or older

Exclusion Criteria:

* Younger than 18
* Unwilling to participate or unable to give informed consent
